name: Oni Oni Ball
description:
SYNOPSIS

Two ogre brothers play their favorite game during their free time. This game consists in falling ko before the opponent by exchanging with the head a stone ball.

DESCRIPTION

- A kind of Pong with characters instead of rackets

- This is not a single player game, it is only played by two people

- The first to lose all his lives wins the game

- Use the keys A/Q, D, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW to move the characters

- With the S and DOWN ARROW keys, you can accelerate the ball

- You can quit the game at any time with the ESC key

- In the title screen, it is possible to change the music style with the space key
